screens.name: Material Master Management
screens.purpose: To manage and maintain detailed records for all materials, including their properties, fabric types, styles, and prints.

features.name: Material Search
features.description: Search and filter materials by name, description, fabric type, or other attributes.

features.name: Add/Edit Material
features.description: Form to add or edit material details like gender, brand, fabric quality, styles, and construction types.

features.name: Material List
features.description: Display all materials with essential details (name, description, width, fabric types) in a tabular format, with options for viewing, editing, or deleting.

additionalOptions.name: Bulk Import
additionalOptions.description: Option to import materials via a CSV or Excel file.

screens.name: Purchase Order Management
screens.purpose: To create, manage, and track purchase orders.

features.name: PO Search and Filter
features.description: Filter and search POs by PO number, vendor, material, and delivery status.

features.name: Create New PO
features.description: Form for entering purchase order details, including PO number, date, item details, unit price, and delivery date.

features.name: PO List
features.description: Display list of all purchase orders with their status (open, completed, partially delivered), including the vendor and delivery dates.

additionalOptions.name: Track Delivery
additionalOptions.description: Link PO to goods receipts for tracking delivery status.

additionalOptions.name: Notifications
additionalOptions.description: Alerts for pending or overdue orders.

screens.name: Inventory Management
screens.purpose: To track and manage inventory, including stock quantities and batch numbers.

features.name: Inventory Overview
features.description: Display current stock levels with material descriptions, batch numbers, colors, and quantities.

features.name: Stock Adjustment
features.description: Option to manually adjust stock quantities (e.g., after receiving goods or correcting errors).

features.name: Stock Search and Filter
features.description: Search and filter by material type, batch number, color, and stock level.

additionalOptions.name: Low Stock Alerts
additionalOptions.description: Set up alerts for materials running low on stock.

additionalOptions.name: Stock Movement
additionalOptions.description: Track stock movement history for each item.
